titleStmt.title: SII 6.369: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 369. (A.R. No. 84 of 1898). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovicaiyakampavarmmarkku yāṇṭu Irupattoṉṟāvatu Uttarameruccaturvvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom Eḻuttu Empakkal sarvvaparicāram peṟṟuirukkum Emmūr teṟkkilaṅkāṭi Iruntuvāḻum maṇṇipākkiḻāṉ koyilukku Ivaṉ ceykiṉṟa tharmmattukku Oṭṭikkuṭutta paricāvatu Ikkoyilpak
kal Ūrkkal cemmai nūṟṟuk kaḻañcu poṉ koṇṭu kaṭavom Ippoṉṉāl dharmappalicaiyāl mūṉṟu mañcāṭi palicaiyāka van=ta poli patiṉṉaiñkaḻañcu poṉṉum Ivaṉ muṉ yāṇṭu patiṉeṭṭāvatu Erikku dharmmattukku mutal tanta nūṟṟuk kaḻañcu poṉṉālum dharmmapaliceyāley van=ta patiṉaiñ kaḻañcu poṉṉum Eṟṟi muppatiṉkaḻañcu poṉṉum teṟkkillaṅkāṭi maṉai poṉ
ṉile Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟum pāḻnīkki niṉṟa maṉaiyil tāṅkaḷ veṇṭu kural Erivāriyaperumakkaḷḷe koḷḷa Oṭṭi kuṭuttom Ivirunūṟṟu kaḻañcu poṉnāl vaṉta palicai muppatiṉ kaḻañcu poṉkoṇṭu caṉtirātittaruḷḷatiṉaiyum Ivayiramekataṭākattu kuḻi kutti Erikaraimel maṇṇaṭṭuvār Āka Ikkoyil vaitta dharmmattukku Oṭṭi Eḻuttiṭṭu kuṭuttom sabhai
yom Ipparicu Ivaṉ dharmmam ceytamaiyil sabhaiyom santoṣittu Ikkoyillukkum makkaḷḷukkum sabhaiyo moṭṭai Iṟaiye Iṟuppāṉṉākavum Ivaṉai maṟṟum Eppoṟppaṭṭa puṟaviṟaiyum maṉaiypoṉṉum Alapiṟaiyum coṟumāṭṭum Uḷḷiṭṭu vaṉta puṟaviṟai koḷḷātommāka Ikkoyillukkum makkaḷḷukkum sarvvaparicārammāka paṇit
tom sabhaiyom Ikkoyillukkum
Digital edition of SII 6.369 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
